A Mentor helps and guides the new employee in professional adaptation and training. Provides feedback to RM on the new employee's performance during probation.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Human Resource Specialist \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"(also called HR)\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is an HR BP or Corporate HR Service team member assigned to each employee in order to provide additional support defined by the Corporate Adaptation process during a new employee's probation.
